meaningMnemonic: There is a <radical>woman</radical> and a <radical>child</radical> in front of you. You <kanji>like</kanji> them very much.
readingMnemonic: "I <kanji>like</kanji> you two," you say to the woman and child. They both turn their heads 180 degrees back towards you. They both have faces that look just like <reading>こう</reading>いち's. "We like you too," they say in unison.
